**NOTE:** GitHub Issues is for bug reports and feature requests. For questions, please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/discussions) where the community can help you more effectively.

## Before You Ask

Please check the following resources before posting a question:

- [ ] [README.md](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1#readme) - Project overview
- [ ] [ARCHITECTURE.md](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/blob/main/ARCHITECTURE.md) - System architecture
- [ ] [CLAUDE.md](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/blob/main/CLAUDE.md) - Development guide
- [ ] [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) - Contribution guidelines
- [ ] [Existing Issues](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/issues) - Search for similar questions
- [ ] [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/SuperInstance/Tripartite1/discussions) - Community discussions

## Your Question

If you've checked the above and still have a question, please:

1. **Use GitHub Discussions** for:
   - "How do I..." questions
   - Best practices
   - Design decisions
   - General project questions
   - Getting started help

2. **Use GitHub Issues** only if you find a bug or have a feature request.
